author: Special Correspondent
text:
Azhagu Balakrishnan and M. Somasundaram have been elected as president and vice-president respectively of Ramanathapuram Bar Association recently.

R. Saleem was elected as secretary, M. Mohanbabu as joint secretary and G. Kesavan as treasurer of the association, election officer A. Selvaraj said in a press release here.

Following are the executive members: N. Manoranjitham, N. Madhavan, P. Muniasamy, A. Manoharan, S. Murugaboopathy, S. Mangaleswaran, S. Muthuramalingam, R. Babu, A. Baskaran, A. Magendiran and R. Balanurugan.

The elected office-bearers would hold office for two years.
title: Office-bearers elected
